overview: Mia, a young, attractive woman and mother starts to question the meaning of life due to external circumstances. She tries to escape into the virtual world of chats, where she meets "Morgenrot" for the first time. It is the beginning of a journey through the unknown, where feelings don't emerge through physical contact, but through words. However, Mia's husband discovers her secret.
title: Mia Meets Morgenrot
